so_55527428: Cannot remove symbolic link to directory
Top-3 Scripts:
so_55527428: $ cd "$(mktemp --directory)"
$ mkdir a
$ stat --format %i a/
9
$ ln --symbolic a b
$ stat --format %i b
10
$ stat --format %i b/
9
